line.text: Or I shall live your epitaph to make
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Or you survive when I in earth am rotten
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: From hence your memory death cannot take
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Although in me each part will be forgotten
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Your name from hence immortal life shall have
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Though I (once gone) to all the world must die
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: The earth can yield me but a common grave
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: When you entombed in men eyes shall lie
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Your monument shall be my gentle verse
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Which eyes not yet created shall oer-read
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: And tongues to be your being shall rehearse
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: When all the breathers of this world are dead
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: You still shall live (such virtue hath my pen)
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Where breath most breathes even in the mouths of men
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*
